website_summaries.verdict: Curl control from a salon that specializes in curly hair.
pros: Eliminates crunchy, dry curls, adding softness and shine
cons: Can require a lot of rinsing out if you use too much

customer_reviews.title: smells lovely, but not for my hair
customer_reviews.text: don't get me wrong...this thing smells lovely! also it aids in detangling my hair in the shower as I comb through after applying this, but as my hair dries, so does the look of my hair. It makes it look thirsty and parched! even though the other reviews say its left their hair amazing, not for me! So on I search for something my locks will love! It's been a search for me for about (hmm...all my life?!?).
customer_reviews.author: melody18

customer_reviews.title: A must have for dry, curly hair that tangles
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, curly hair (Caucasian, 3A/B for those who know the lingo). Corkscrew curls but an uneven distribution so I do blow it dry. I have always had serious issues with my hair tangling while shampooing. There was a famous salon brand that caused my fingernails to rip; that is how tangled my hair gets. I discovered Ouidad when I was wearing my hair curly for a few years. It is such a good brand. This product is recommended for more intense curl than I have, but I strongly recommend it even for Caucasian hair. My hair is so healthy and shiny now. The co sit-up we smells a bit like honeydew melon.
customer_reviews.author: Minza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - use it as a deep conditioner, too.
customer_reviews.text: If your curls tend to be dry this conditioner will quickly clear up the problem. I've been using it for over 5 years with great results. Here's a tip: pop on a heating cap and it works just as well as a deep conditioner, better than Ouidad's $$$$ deep conditioner, IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Earth School

customer_reviews.title: Love Ouidad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great moisturing conditioner. I have very fine naturally curly hair that I have colored every few weeks. My hair is very dry and this conditioner is just the thing for it. It's got a fairly thick consistency, which I like, but like all of the Ouidad products, does not weigh my hair down. I love Ouidad! I have used several products and have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: joyful60

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shampoo for curly hair! Mine is now grey, which is colored a warm brown. I was using Deva Curl shampoo and conditioner until it turned my blond highlights to the exact consistency and appearance of dried straw. I looked like a witch. From the first Ouidad shampoo (I also use the conditioner) my hair was much softer and less frizzy and dry. By the second use my hair looks and feels great. I love this line!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Berkshires

customer_reviews.title: A+++ Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner is really wonderful. My hair felt so soft and moisturized. I love it. I am 6 weeks post relaxer and with the heat this summer it's been tough to keep moisture in my hair. I failed to mention in my review of the shampoo partner to this conditioner is the low ph balance which l think really helped the conditioner do a great job of softening my hair and giving it shine and less frizz. I love it! I encourage you to give it a try. I will definitely purchase in mass.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Curly Girl Problems
customer_reviews.text: as a curly girl i am always looking for a better conditioner. I got this as a sample from somewhere and loved how it leaves my hair. I am slowly moving towards more items in the Ouidad line. I would give it 5 stars but it is quite costly as compared to even other salon brand products. BUt i really love it and am paying the extra for it
customer_reviews.author: Lee Michelle Prager

customer_reviews.title: Better-than-expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I was going to be impressed with this product but I actually liked it! I used a couple of other products not too long ago that seem to make my hair look really dry and Frizzy but this product seem to kind of Bring It Back to Life where it was before using the other products. It's got a very nice pleasant scent and not overpowering. I've only used it twice but so far I like it. I may change my review later but for now it stands at a 5 :-)
customer_reviews.author: Brad K

customer_reviews.title: Coarse and curly hair, this stuff is the best
customer_reviews.text: She had so many problems with my hair. It's type 3. I've tried multiple things, seriously it's sad how much I've spent and nothing had worked. This stuff does. My hair is coarse and curly and this makes it soft and wonderfully moisturized. The only sad thing is how expensive this is, really it breaks my heart. So I treat my self once and awhile with this.
customer_reviews.author: hd

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3a-b curls.
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent for my 3a-b curly hair. I use it each morning during my shower (I only wash my hair a couple of times per week, other than that, I just condition with this product, comb it through my hair during my shower, and then rinse my hair with cool water after my shower. I use a couple of products after my shower, including a very small dab of coconut oil as a final layer (to contain the frizzies). This is a good product and I recommend it to my family and friends with curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Goldielocks512

customer_reviews.title: Left my hair very dry
customer_reviews.text: the first time I used this product, my hair was great, smooth and controlled. But after the second time, my hair started to feel dry and frizzy. Be aware that this conditioner contains some kinds of silicone, and maybe that’s why it was not good for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: O B M B

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first, but over time my hair got dry and difficult to brush. I tried using a shampoo that removes build up, but that didn't change anything. I switched to a different conditioner and my hair is doing much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in Cali

customer_reviews.title: Product lied read the label, drys out your hair.
customer_reviews.text: Just tried all of the product and all of them had my hair worse than when I started. I will never purchased. I can understand why you might not take them all back due to the time frame a person will try the product. But, they are hard on curly hair and scalp.
customer_reviews.author: C L-Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It’s quidad. What else do you need to know. Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very little product does the job. What more can I say. It’s quidad that’s all you need to know. This product never disappoints and the longer you use thes products the healthier and curlier your hair becomes. Worth the price for great curls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews, but this product was so horrible, I had to. My heathy curly hair felt like straw after using this, and it made it HARDER to comb through. Are you kidding!? I'm not just disappointed, I'm mad. HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE. I see now that some reviews say this is a counterfeit product from Amazon? I don't know if this is true, but whatever this is does not work. I would give this zero stars if I could. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyne Crunk

customer_reviews.title: Noticable pleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: If you're sensitive to smells you might want to smell it before purchasing. It's definitely moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Broken Pump
customer_reviews.text: The conditioner itself is ok. I don't feel like it's anything special. I'm disappointed for the price you pay for this that the pump has stopped working. I now have to take the top off and squeeze some out every time I need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't weigh down fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine curly hair.this conditioner moisturized my hair without weighing it down.it has a subtle light fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia L Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Great for Curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this conditioner! I have very corkscrew curly hair that tends to become frizzy with humidity. I started using this after I decided to stop torturing myself and my hair with blow drying and flat ironing on a daily basis. Not to mention the 45 mins it takes to do it@ Ouidad makes quality hair products for us curly girls. I love how this moisturizes and softens my hair! Will definitely buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Too Pricey for Outcome
customer_reviews.text: Product just okay overall. Moisturized pretty good, but very small container and it took a lot of product to work well. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L. Stuck

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARSSSSSSSS
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but worth it!! Started using this product after the Devacurl study about hair damage/loss and really have noticed a huge difference with the product change. My hair looks much healthier now, finally growing out and feeling fuller!
customer_reviews.author: brittany b

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product!
customer_reviews.text: I agree after reading all the comments this is a fake Ouidad product! I think this is a counterfeit product as well! I have also used this product FOREVER and it is not the right consistancy and ALSO dried my hair out terribly this is not the real thing!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth the money?
customer_reviews.text: I had been using deva curl conditioner... I really haven’t noticed a different using this- and it’s a little pricy
customer_reviews.author: enzos

customer_reviews.title: Hair breakage
customer_reviews.text: Something is off about this product! When my hair dresser used it at the salon felt and looked great but as I used it long term at home my hair felt dry at the ends, broke easy, and fell out so much faster than it should for a normal person! So upset
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Ariza Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. I normally use Ouidad's Lock-in leave in condtioner and so when I was running out I decided to give this a try in hopes that it would work just as well. After using it a few times, I find that my curls are too poufy, even when I use a bit of the leave in conditioner on top of that, my curls look bushed out and not as smooth. Will be going back to the other conditioner, disappointed that I wasted money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann C.

customer_reviews.title: A bit waxy
customer_reviews.text: Not as great a moisturizer as I had hoped for my course hair. It works OK, but has a bit of a waxy consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I've used Curl Quencher Moisturizing Conditioner for years and I'm confident that the 33.8 ounce bottle I bought on Amazon is counterfeit. The product's consistency, look and performance are different from the real thing. Shame on you, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: No slip and made my hair feel like straw
customer_reviews.text: I have baby fine wavy hair that needs a lot of moisture. I saw all the great reviews and decided to try this. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Readhead13

customer_reviews.title: Try another conditioner
customer_reviews.text: It made my hair soft while the product was in the hair, but after I rinsed my hair, it was like no product was ever put in there. Try a smaller bottle size first. I’m just going to use it until it’s gone.
customer_reviews.author: Shy R.

customer_reviews.title: Th is stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing I've been looking for a product that will bring my natural curls back to life and this does just that, perfectly. My curls don't fall flat, no frizz, stays soft & bouncy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: jacqui

customer_reviews.title: my curls love ouidad
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Ouidad for about 5 years after trying EVERYTHING ELSE for over 30 years. They are by far the best products for my medium to tight curly hair!
customer_reviews.author: L. Dawes

customer_reviews.title: My favorite condition. Leaves my hair silky soft
customer_reviews.text: My favorite condition. Leaves my hair silky soft. I go to Morgan at the ouidad salon in Santa Monica. If you have curly or wavy hair you know all the haircuts you wish you never had. This is hands down the best haircut of my life and worth every penny. Love all the products from this line.
customer_reviews.author: nicole hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth $20 for this small bottle
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell that good and it’s just like any other curl shampoo. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Jean

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: It's only been a few months but this product has been done a great job with my curly hair. Oddly enough, the curls are tighter on the off days when the conditioner is not used. The only negatives, admittedly small, are that the container is difficult to squeeze and the print instructions on it are so tiny as to require a magnifying glass to read.
customer_reviews.author: Zelig05

customer_reviews.title: My curls look more defined. cute curls.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy. I got it two days ago and tried it today. Works great. My hair gets curlier than before. Curls look more defined and nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rico

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping and Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite conditioner. I have relatively tight curls and nothing tames the frizz and produces the best curls like Ouidad. I also appreciate the quick shipping! I received my bottle in 2 days, which was nice considering I had just run out!
customer_reviews.author: Marina Gallinger

customer_reviews.title: This conditioner smells amazing and makes my curls softer and more manageable
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner smells amazing and makes my curls softer and more manageable. For a little bit of info I have dry curly hair from over processing and this conditioner has made my hair softer and less frizzy. If you have dry hair I recommend using this with a leave in conditioner such as Caviar 10 in 1. It will make you love your curls again!
customer_reviews.author: thegreatpanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this conditioner for my daughter's very curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this conditioner for my daughter's very curly hair! She also uses it as a mask treatment because her hair is very dry and helps keep highlights looking vibrant as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry hair. This is one of the few conditioners on the market that hydrates my hair and leaves my corkscrew curls looking perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: curly hair and found this on a list of best beauty products
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, curly hair and found this on a list of best beauty products. Fantastic. My hair can get frizzy on the outer layers and I do have my hair colored. Not a lot needed and I used it as conditioner. My hair is softer, smoother, and seems to be in better condition. Only disappointed in what a tiny bottle it is - kind of expensive for the amount your receive but a really great product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: tms

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Size
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how much this has improved my hair quality: Although, the size of the conditioner is fantastic! I’ve tried many different conditioners and haven’t found the right one yet. This is pretty equal to the results I get from Devacurl.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: I love this conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner. I love the smell and it makes my hair feel soft. I have tried other products but I came back to this. My hair feels a lot healthier and my hair dresser has noticed a difference. When I switched conditioner she noticed and told me to keep using this product she could tell a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is okay but doesn't feel like anything special, which it should at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: YMMV: curls felt dry after use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice texture and the smell was decent, but it left my fine curly hair feeling dry after 2-3 uses. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Killian

customer_reviews.title: Frizz free for days
customer_reviews.text: I have used these products for 20 years! I love them
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cheek

customer_reviews.title: My curl s have never been happier. It's a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: My curl s have never been happier. It's a little pricey, but a little goes a very long way. This size bottle lasts me a couple months and I have very thick, long hair. A great investment in my keeping my hair frizz-free.
customer_reviews.author: Gtt942

customer_reviews.title: Dry curly hair remedy
customer_reviews.text: Love this conditioner! I have been using it for 6 years and it keeps my dry curls soft and shiny
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Love this conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this conditioner! My hair is so much healthier using this with the Ouidad shampoo! My curls look great now, not weighed down with heavy products!
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie Searock

customer_reviews.title: Shiny beautiful curls!
customer_reviews.text: This line of hair products for curly hair is perfect. These products are high quality that have changed my hair. My hair is shiny, healthy, and longer than it has ever been. My curls are so happy now and I receive constant compliments.
customer_reviews.author: E. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for thirsty hair
customer_reviews.text: Can't get around the price but I think the product is well worth the cost. Will have to order more before end of summer, pleasant fragrance too.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Wish it cost less
customer_reviews.text: Always looking for the perfect gel and this might be it.I wish it cost less but it does work and does not make my hair crunchy. Nice shine and you do not need to add too much gel. If your looking to cut back on buying a trillion gels this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice big bottle but only the tiniest bit comes out of the pump at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Zemelman

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: Conditioner broke down inside the bottle and smells like skunk.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: She tried many and this one is her favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Somehow my wife likes this conditioner. She tried many and this one is her favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Homelyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for very fine curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: Like many folks with curls you try a million products - top it off that my curls are very fine - frizz city. This shampoo and conditioner combo is fabulous. Really defines the curls and minimizes frizz- especially if you take the time to comb through in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: jaybird

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Conditions my hair like no other product. #1. But. I’ve discovered that products don’t work the same for all hair even if the curl patterns are similar.
customer_reviews.author: mr. k

customer_reviews.title: It too think for the pump
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why it would be but the conditioner is so thick the pump doesn't even pump it out. I have to open the huge bottle and really struggle to get it out!
customer_reviews.author: NRBH

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I wish i didn’t waste my time or money on this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using this on fine, wavy (color-treated) hair
customer_reviews.text: This tight curl version does exactly that. Using this on fine, wavy (color-treated) hair, mid-back length, creates tight accordion pleats.
customer_reviews.author: HC Messenger

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered direct from manufacturer. This has left my hair completely damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rehana

customer_reviews.title: Really good product.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product line. It can be expensive to purchase the whole set but we'll worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: For curly hair...
customer_reviews.text: I am Caucasian with curly hair. This product does an okay job of conditioning my hair, but I much prefer other products I have tried. My hair feels dry and course after I rinse this product out.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.E.

customer_reviews.title: ... with Moisture Lock Gel and my curls come out beautiful. (defined and soft)
customer_reviews.text: I mix this 1/2 and 1/2 with Moisture Lock Gel and my curls come out beautiful. (defined and soft)
customer_reviews.author: KMPlatz

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. My wife's hair is so much more ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. My wife's hair is so much more healthy and beautiful. Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Todd Wynia

customer_reviews.title: Best conditioner I've found for curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is expensive, but AMAZING. It works so well and makes my daughter's hair curlier. I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hite

customer_reviews.title: my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use Wen in winter and use this after to add back the curl and shine. Wen leaves it a little flat. This is super wonderful stuff. get it/
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! I used to have to use 3 products to get my hair under control now I use just this!
customer_reviews.author: on-line shopper lover

customer_reviews.title: Drys up your hair
customer_reviews.text: Somehow made my hair feel worse after. It almost felt plastic and dry after using. Also not really great for detangling.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo Hage

customer_reviews.title: No frizz
customer_reviews.text: The ends of my hair can get pretty dry. This conditioner has definitely helped with that as well as locking my curls so I'm not so frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me! Honestly I'm about to give ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me! Honestly I'm about to give up on my curly hair! Nothing works for me anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Aishia Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Soft, shiny hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair was fried from over coloring. After using this shampoo and conditioner my hair is so shiny and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curls are back!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a product to help my dry, frizzy hair become the beautiful curls I was born with
customer_reviews.author: Iphigenia

customer_reviews.title: I don’t mind paying More for a Product that Works
customer_reviews.text: The only product I have found that works on my daughters Curly and Thick hair without having to add extra conditioning before we comb out her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Wish I've known about it sooner. My son's hair is no longer frizzy after shampooing and conditioning. Has a nice smell.
customer_reviews.author: Santana Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: If you have loose curls, this line is outstanding, especially for fine hair that breaks and frizzes easy (like mine!)
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Misuraca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hair has a lot of natural curl and Ouidad works well in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McCain

customer_reviews.title: I believe they watered it down or something. Did ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe they watered it down or something. Did nothing for my curly hair. WAY too expensive for what it was
customer_reviews.author: Laurie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Love Ouidad products. After using multiple curl specific hair products, I always come back to Ouidad.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Jones

customer_reviews.title: Curvey Curls in Reach - Minimize Frizzzzzz
customer_reviews.text: Can be beat for taming curls and bring out the best in your hair.
customer_reviews.author: BamfamLA

customer_reviews.title: Love this conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I have curly, frizzy hair. This helps to tame it. Love this conditioner.....
customer_reviews.author: Bella Italia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my hair. Works on my thin, curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: BCS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: As in my review for the shampoo, I was pleasantly surprised at how using just the Ouidad products could make such a difference in the way my hair looks. They do not cause my hair to dry out. I have extremely tight, curly, frizzy hair and these products tame my hair. Makes a difference in the look of my hair if I use all Ouidad products.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Really moisturizes!
customer_reviews.text: Most conditioners for curly hair leave my hair dry and frizzy. This one works really well, leaving my hair shiny and my curls bouncy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Tangles, but bouncy
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner didn't rinse through well and left lots of tangles, but worked well to keep curly hair bouncy and not flat.
customer_reviews.author: Rēg & Lady

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day. I love the scent, and it keeps my hair from being fuzzy. Keeps it very moisturized and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Doria E Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product works for my thick dry hair helps make it shiny and a little silkier
customer_reviews.author: KMac

customer_reviews.title: Best conditioner for curls
customer_reviews.text: Great product, leaves my loose curls and my sons tight curls very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jayda Benton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Again, purchased originally at the hair salon but this was a much better price. Makes hair manageable without being unruly.
customer_reviews.author: SusanC

customer_reviews.title: Moisture
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great product for my curly hair. The curls are so much better
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Burleigh

customer_reviews.title: great conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This tames my frizzy hair, and my hair drinks it up! I only need a very small amount to condition my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Margot in New York

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this conditioner! For color-treated, lifeless hair, it's the ticket! =D
customer_reviews.author: Kim R Kasmeier

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love all their products....it really works and its perfect for my dry, curly hair!
customer_reviews.author: Pretola

customer_reviews.title: I started using this product and my entire scalp broke ...
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product and my entire scalp broke out in acne within a week. I stopped my usage and the scalp acne went away. Not sure what is in it but I highly discourage the use of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Farnaz Fahid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent conditioner - my hair is healthier and my curls look much better
customer_reviews.author: CJMM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love how this calms my frizzy curls. Nice and soft hair, too.
customer_reviews.author: Happyoldlady

customer_reviews.title: I love this product line
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner really softens my curly thick hair. I love this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very drying
customer_reviews.text: Left my hair very dry and brittle. Also left white chunks in hair
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing wrong with this conditioner -- it's totally fine. It does the job. I have dry, curly black hair that's stripped and color-treated, and frizzy, so I'm careful and selective about picking products that serve my hair well. This does a great job, but I've used other products at cheaper prices that perform just-as-well. So while I have no complaint about this product's performance, I just think that you can find better values elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Khalessi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a reorder -- that's how much we like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily untangles hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and like how my hair untangles so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Riterrebs

product_meta.title: Curl Quencher Moisturizing Conditioner
product_meta.description:
Size:33.8 OunceTight curls’ worst enemy is dryness — and the resulting tangles that can take over the better part of your head if you're not careful. That means the right conditioner is key to prevent dry hair and ensure you don't stress about annoying snags. That's where our supremely hydrating formula for curly hair comes into play. The Curl Quencher Moisturizing Conditioner from Ouidad infuses curls with healthy moisture to prevent frizzy hair and make detangling a breeze, so your tight curls are more manageable to style. Nourishing botanicals and vitamins in our hydrating formula enhance the moisture of your hair from within to maximize natural curl definition and shine. Our hydrating Curl Quencher Moisturizing Conditioner includes Algae Extract and Wheat Amino Acids help to seal hair's cuticle, locking in the moisture curls need — without the heaviness they don't. Curls are left soft and supple with buoyant bounce. Pair with a Ouidad shampoo and our other products for curly hair to maximize your results. Cleanse curls with Curl Quencher Moisturizing Shampoo. Rinse, then apply conditioner in sections and comb through hair using a wide-tooth comb to detangle. Start at the ends of hair and work up toward the scalp. Leave conditioner in hair for three minutes. Rinse, and style as usual. Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Glycerin, Panthenol (Provitamin B5), Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Echinacea Purpurea Extract, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Algae Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Wheat Amino Acids, Amodimethicone, Octoxynol-40, Isolaureth-6, Keratin Amino Acids, Linoleamidopropyl Ethyldimonium Ethosulfate, Dimethyl Lauramine Isostearate, Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Fragrance (Parfum), Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.

BRAND STORY
Ouidad is the original curl expert with one iconic idea — let curls be curls. For over 30 years, we’ve perfected a unique customized approach for each curl type: Loose, Classic, Tight, and Kinky curls.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
